Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Server
extends Object
implements Runnable
Class managing the server. Its main thread (started using run()), creates a new thread listening to incoming socket connections. Then, it manages the messages received by clients sequentially. This class works as an entry point for the game management.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Server​(int port)
    Instantiates a new server listening to a given port.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server​(int port)
      Instantiates a new server listening to a given port. It also creates a new IController.
      Parameters:
      port - A valid port (0 to 65535). For best results, be aware of TCP well-known ports.

  • Method Details

    • setPlayerNumber

      protected boolean setPlayerNumber​(int chosenPlayerNumber)
      Sets the number of player synchronously. Can be done only once.
      Parameters:
      chosenPlayerNumber - Player number chosen by the selected client (2 or 3).
      Returns:
      true if the player number has been set correctly, false otherwise.

    • canStartSetup

      protected boolean canStartSetup()
      Synchronously checks if player number has already been set and setup can start
      Returns:
      true if setup can start, false otherwise.

    • isGameStarted

      protected boolean isGameStarted()
      Synchronously checks if game has already started
      Returns:
      true if game has started, false otherwise.

    • checkAndBeginSetup

      protected void checkAndBeginSetup()
      Checks if player number has already been set and, if there are enough players, starts the registration.

    • registerConnection

      protected void registerConnection​(IClientConnection connection)
      Registers a new connection to the waiting list.
      Parameters:
      connection - Reference to the connection being registered.

    • deregisterConnection

      protected void deregisterConnection​(IClientConnection connection)
      Deregisters a connection previously registered using registerConnection(IClientConnection)
      Parameters:
      connection - Reference to the connection being deregistered.

    • addMessage

      protected void addMessage​(Answer message, IClientConnection connection)
      Synchronously adds a message to the BlockingQueue
      Parameters:
      message - Message being added
      connection - Connection that added the message

    • asyncSendTo

      public void asyncSendTo​(String player, Request message)
      Sends a message to a given player. See IClientConnection.asyncSend(Request) for further information. Should be executed by the same thread that manages the message. If either the player does not exists or the message in null, method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      player - Player name
      message - Message being sent

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs a queue message consumer, forwarding Answer to controller and model.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
